When you upload complete DVDs, you ought to clearly specify whether they are in European PAL format or in North American NTSC format.
Correct, it's deleted still not removed for whatever the reason is.

Sorry to hear, looked very promising!
Any chance for a re-upload?
DVD 2 seems to be working now, but DVD 1 is still without seeder(s); hopefully this will turn for the better too!
